Summary: (flock of bright white birds-without wings,NO sound)-first impression.
divs: Sighting DetailsWELL,I WOKE UP ABOUT 2:30 A.M.,SMOKED CIG.,GLANCED OUT BEDRM WINDOW.ABOVE THIS HUGE PINE TREE-ABOUT 300FT.,I SEEN WHAT LOOKED LIKE A BIG FLOCK OF EXTREMELY WHITE BIRDS FLYING IN A JAGGED V FORMATION.I SAY OUT LOUD(NO FRIGGIN WAY!!),.MY FIRST THOUGHT, OH, A FLOCK OF GEESE.WELL,NO.1-GEESE SWAWK LIKE MAD WHEN THEY FLY OVER,PLUS THEY ARE A LOT MORE GREY.ANYWAY,IT WAS EERILY QUIET.,(WE LIVE NEXT TO FREEWAY),. I WAS JUST MESMERIZED BY THIS,I COULDN'T TAKE MY EYES OFF OF IT,(OR I WOULD HAVE RAN TO THE NEXT WINDOW OVER TO MY LEFT,TO GET ANOTHER LOOK.)IT FINALLY WENT BEHINDS CLOUDS.THIS ALL HAPPENED IN ABOUT 15 SECS.IT HAS REALLY BEEN BOTHERING ME.MY MIND IS TRYING TO TELL ME IT WAS BIRDS,(BUT IT WAS SO UN-NATURAL TO SEE).I AM NOT SURE WHAT I SAW, YET!I FELT SO IN AWE.,CURIOUS,AND A LITTLE FRIGHTENED.I HAVE ALWAYS BELIEVED THAT WE WERE NOT ALONE.,WITH SUCH HUGE GALAXIES,AND ETC.,AFTER THIS I AM MORE INTERESTED IN FINDING OUT ALL I CAN.I AM GOING ON 55,AND JUST LATELY I HAVE BEEN MORE CURIOUS THAN EVER.THANX
